local_intent: Perceive red plate, move above it, lower until contact, confirm contact, release white plate, retreat and wait.
assumptions: White plate is already in the gripper from prior pick
Red plate is on the mat within reach and roughly to the left as described
Perception may require a scan if initial detect fails
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase from the global plan: perception of red plate, approach, controlled lowering until contact, open gripper to release, and safe retreat.
